welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haltom City, where southern hospitality meets city charm! Get ready to experience our vibrant community known for its friendly locals, delicious food, and rich culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all the wonderful things our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at DFW, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A hub for American Airlines, with many international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal, with a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A hub for Delta Airlines, with many domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A smaller terminal with a focus on regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a gift shop, restaurant, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport houses ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Love Field Airport is primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redbird Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
